Data Fields
pmhalLP8731RegulatorMap Struct Reference

LP8731 Regulator Map description structure. This is used for keeping track of the regulator connection to the I2C instance and PMIC device. More...

#include <pmhal_lp8731.h>

Data Fields

pmhalLP8731RegulatorPtr_t regulatorMap
 
uint8_t i2cInstanceNum
 
uint8_t i2cSlaveAddress
 

Detailed Description

LP8731 Regulator Map description structure. This is used for keeping track of the regulator connection to the I2C instance and PMIC device.

Field Documentation

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorMap::i2cInstanceNum

SoC I2C instance number to which the regulator of the PMIC will be connected to.

uint8_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorMap::i2cSlaveAddress

PMIC slave Address to which the regulator is connected to

pmhalLP8731RegulatorPtr_t pmhalLP8731RegulatorMap::regulatorMap

Pointer to the regulator properties
